Test.TestName: ADVANCED_SECURITY-8-1-5-v15.06 Get Certification Path Validation Policy
Test.Name: Correct response (PKCS10ExternalCertificationWithRSA)
Test.Description:
The DUT sends all correct responses
cap.KeystoreCapabilities.PKCS10ExternalCertificationWithRSA = true

Test.TestName: ADVANCED_SECURITY-8-1-5-v15.06 Get Certification Path Validation Policy
Test.Name: Correct response (SelfSignedCertificateCreationWithRSA and RSAKeyPairGeneration)
Test.Description: The DUT sends all correct responses cap.KeystoreCapabilities.PKCS10ExternalCertificationWithRSA = false cap.KeystoreCapabilities.SelfSignedCertificateCreationWithRSA =true cap.KeystoreCapabilities.RSAKeyPairGeneration = true

Test.TestName: ADVANCED_SECURITY-8-1-5-v15.06 Get Certification Path Validation Policy
Test.Name: Correct response (PKCS12CertificateWithRSAPrivateKeyUpload)
Test.Description: The DUT sends all correct responses cap.KeystoreCapabilities.PKCS10ExternalCertificationWithRSA = false cap.KeystoreCapabilities.SelfSignedCertificateCreationWithRSA =true cap.KeystoreCapabilities.RSAKeyPairGeneration = false cap.KeystoreCapabilities.PKCS12CertificateWithRSAPrivateKeyUpload = true

Test.TestName: ADVANCED_SECURITY-8-1-5-v15.06 Get Certification Path Validation Policy
Test.Name: Correct response (PKCS12CertificateWithRSAPrivateKeyUpload) 2
Test.Description: The DUT sends all correct responses cap.KeystoreCapabilities.PKCS10ExternalCertificationWithRSA = false cap.KeystoreCapabilities.SelfSignedCertificateCreationWithRSA =false cap.KeystoreCapabilities.RSAKeyPairGeneration = true cap.KeystoreCapabilities.PKCS12CertificateWithRSAPrivateKeyUpload = true

Test.TestName: ADVANCED_SECURITY-8-1-5-v15.06 Get Certification Path Validation Policy
Test.Name: Invalid response (PKCS10ExternalCertificationWithRSA): GetCertPathValidationPolicy - TrustAnchors (more than expected)
Test.Description:
cap.KeystoreCapabilities.PKCS10ExternalCertificationWithRSA = true
10. If certPathValidationPolicy.TrustAnchor is not containe one and only one element with CertificateID equal to certID, FAIL the test, and go to the step 11.

Test.TestName: ADVANCED_SECURITY-8-1-5-v15.06 Get Certification Path Validation Policy
Test.Name: Invalid response (PKCS10ExternalCertificationWithRSA): GetCertPathValidationPolicy - TrustAnchors (wrong CertificateID)
Test.Description:
cap.KeystoreCapabilities.PKCS10ExternalCertificationWithRSA = true
10. If certPathValidationPolicy.TrustAnchor is not containe one and only one element with CertificateID equal to certID, FAIL the test, and go to the step 11.

Test.TestName: ADVANCED_SECURITY-8-1-5-v15.06 Get Certification Path Validation Policy
Test.Name: Invalid response (PKCS10ExternalCertificationWithRSA): GetCertPathValidationPolicy - UseDeltaCRLs (false)
Test.Description:
cap.KeystoreCapabilities.PKCS10ExternalCertificationWithRSA = true
9. If certPathValidationPolicy.Parameters.UseDeltaCRLs is not equal to true, FAIL the test, and go to the step 11.

cap.KeystoreCapabilities.PKCS10ExternalCertificationWithRSA = true

7. If certPathValidationPolicy.Alias is not equal to “Test CertPathValidationPolicy Alias”, FAIL the test, and go to the step 11.
